{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-19T15:50:18.000Z", "description": "

******NO C2C/3RD PARTY, LOOKING FOR W2 CANDIDATES ONLY, must be able to work in the US without sponsorship now or in the future***


Job Title: Software Engineer

Location: Burlingame, CA (Remote)

Duration: 6-12 Months


Summary:

Looking for software engineers to contribute towards adopting our libraries, build systems, and dependencies on a new (non-posix) operating system. Software engineers will work alongside our computer vision staff, using multiple repositories to fix build systems and dependencies to bring up a Computer Vision stack (SLAM).


Job Responsibilities:

\u2022 Integrate computer vision libraries to a new OS and identify and fix missing dependencies.

\u2022 Back propagate all changes in libraries to the main repository.

\u2022 Regularly report job progress to team management.


Skills:

\u2022 Expertise in C++

\u2022 Design of portable libraries for Linux and Android.

\u2022 Strong knowledge of build systems.

\u2022 Knowledge of version control.

\u2022 Experience configuring, building, and testing libraries for Linux and Android.
